Frequently Asked Questions

Get answers to common questions about working with fee-only fiduciary financial advisors.

What does "fee-only" mean?

Fee-only means we are compensated directly by you through transparent fees, not through commissions or product sales. This eliminates conflicts of interest and ensures our recommendations are always in your best interest.

What is the minimum investment to work with you?

We typically work with clients who have $500,000+ in investable assets. However, we evaluate each situation individually and may make exceptions for high-potential clients or those with complex planning needs.

How are your fees structured?

Our fees are transparent and based on assets under management, typically ranging from 0.75% to 1.25% annually depending on portfolio size. We also offer project-based planning for specific financial needs.

Do you work with clients outside BC?

While our primary focus is British Columbia, we can work with clients across Canada. We conduct many meetings virtually and travel for significant client relationships when needed.

What makes you different from other advisors?

As fee-only fiduciary advisors, we're legally bound to act in your best interest. We specialize in tax-efficient strategies for high-net-worth clients and have a 98% client retention rate over 15+ years.

How often will we meet?

We typically meet quarterly for portfolio reviews and annually for comprehensive plan updates. We're also available for ad-hoc meetings when life changes or market conditions require strategy adjustments.

WestGroup Financial - Your Trusted Vancouver Financial Advisors
WestGroup Financial Management Inc. is a registered investment advisor licensed in British Columbia. Securities offered through licensed representatives. Investment advisory services provided as a fiduciary. Past performance does not guarantee future results. All investments involve risk including potential loss of principal.

Serving: Vancouver, Surrey, Burnaby, Richmond, North Vancouver, West Vancouver, Coquitlam, Langley, Delta, New Westminster, and all of Metro Vancouver and Fraser Valley.
